verses.verse: Then Samuel <WH8050> took <WH3947> the flask <WH6378> of oil, <WH8081> poured <WH3332> it on his head, <WH7218> kissed <WH5401> him and said, <WH559> "Has not the Lord <WH3068> anointed <WH4886> you a ruler <WH5057> over <WH5921> His inheritance <WH5159>?

"When you go <WH1980> from me today, <WH3117> then you will find <WH4672> two <WH8147> men <WH376> close <WH5973> to Rachel's tomb <WH6900> in the territory <WH1366> of Benjamin <WH1144> at Zelzah; <WH6766> and they will say <WH559> to you, 'The donkeys <WH860> which <WH834> you went <WH1980> to look <WH1245> for have been found. <WH4672> Now behold, <WH2009> your father has ceased <WH1> to be concerned <WH5203> about the donkeys <WH1697> and is anxious <WH860> for you, saying, <WH1672> "What <WH559> shall I do <WH4100> about my son <WH6213>? "'

"Then you will go <WH2498> on further <WH1973> from there, <WH8033> and you will come <WH935> as far <WH5704> as the oak <WH436> of Tabor, <WH8396> and there <WH8033> three <WH7969> men <WH376> going <WH5927> up to God <WH430> at Bethel <WH1008> will meet <WH4672> you, one <WH259> carrying <WH5375> three <WH7969> kids, <WH1423> another <WH259> carrying <WH5375> three <WH7969> loaves <WH3603> of bread, <WH3899> and another <WH259> carrying <WH5375> a jug <WH9311> of wine; <WH3196>
and they will greet <WH7592> <WH7965> you and give <WH5414> you two <WH8147> [loaves] of bread, <WH3899> which you will accept <WH3947> from their hand. <WH3027>

"Afterward <WH310> <WH3651> you will come <WH935> to the hill <WH1389> of God <WH430> where <WH834> <WH8033> the Philistine <WH6430> garrison <WH5333> is; and it shall be as soon as you have come <WH935> there <WH8033> to the city, <WH5892> that you will meet <WH6293> a group <WH9112> of prophets <WH5030> coming <WH3381> down <WH3381> from the high <WH1116> place <WH1116> with harp, <WH5035> tambourine, <WH8596> flute, <WH2485> and a lyre <WH3658> before <WH6440> them, and they will be prophesying. <WH5012>
"Then the Spirit <WH7307> of the Lord <WH3068> will come <WH9484> upon you mightily, <WH9484> and you shall prophesy <WH5012> with them and be changed <WH2015> into another <WH312> man. <WH376>
"And it shall be when <WH3588> these <WH428> signs <WH226> come <WH935> to you, do <WH6213> for yourself what <WH834> the occasion <WH3027> requires; <WH4672> for God <WH430> is with you.

"And you shall go <WH3381> down <WH3381> before <WH6440> me to Gilgal; <WH1537> and behold, <WH2009> I will come <WH3381> down <WH3381> to you to offer <WH5927> burnt <WH5930> offerings <WH5930> and sacrifice <WH2076> peace <WH8002> offerings. <WH8002> You shall wait <WH3176> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> until <WH5704> I come <WH935> to you and show <WH3045> you what <WH834> you should do. <WH6213>"

Then it happened <WH1961> when he turned <WH6437> his back <WH7926> to leave <WH1980> <WH4480> <WH5973> Samuel, <WH8050> God <WH430> changed <WH2015> his heart; <WH3820> and all <WH3605> those <WH428> signs <WH226> came <WH935> about on that day. <WH3117>

When they came <WH935> to the hill <WH1389> there, <WH8033> behold, <WH2009> a group <WH9112> of prophets <WH5030> met <WH7122> him; and the Spirit <WH7307> of God <WH430> came <WH9484> upon him mightily, <WH9484> so that he prophesied <WH5012> among <WH8432> them.

And it came <WH1961> about, when all <WH3605> who knew <WH3045> him previously <WH4480> <WH8032> <WH865> saw <WH7200> that he prophesied <WH5012> now <WH2009> with the prophets, <WH5030> that the people <WH5971> said <WH559> to one <WH376> another, <WH7453> "What <WH4100> has happened <WH1961> to the son <WH1121> of Kish <WH7027>? Is Saul <WH7586> also <WH1571> among the prophets <WH5030>?"

And a man <WH376> there <WH4480> <WH8033> answered <WH6030> and said, <WH559> "Now, who <WH4310> is their father?" Therefore <WH1> <WH5921> it became <WH3651> a proverb: <WH1961> "Is Saul <WH4912> also <WH7586> among the prophets <WH1571>?"
When he had finished <WH3615> prophesying, <WH5012> he came <WH935> to the high <WH1116> place. <WH1116>

Now Saul's uncle <WH1730> said <WH559> to him and his servant, <WH5288> "Where <WH575> did you go <WH1980>?" And he said, <WH559> "To look <WH1245> for the donkeys. <WH860> When we saw <WH7200> that they could not be found, <WH369> we went <WH935> to Samuel. <WH8050>"
And Saul's uncle <WH1730> said, <WH559> "Please <WH4994> tell <WH5046> me what <WH4100> Samuel <WH8050> said <WH559> to you."

So Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> to his uncle, <WH1730> "He told <WH5046> us plainly <WH5046> that the donkeys <WH860> had been found. <WH4672>" But he did not tell <WH5046> him about the matter <WH1697> of the kingdom <WH4410> which <WH834> Samuel <WH8050> had mentioned. <WH559>
Thereafter Samuel <WH8050> called <WH6817> the people <WH5971> together <WH6817> to the Lord <WH3068> at Mizpah; <WH4709>

and he said <WH559> to the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> "Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> 'I brought <WH5927> Israel <WH3478> up from Egypt, <WH4714> and I delivered <WH5337> you from the hand <WH3027> of the Egyptians, <WH4714> and from the power <WH3027> of all <WH3605> the kingdoms <WH4467> that were oppressing <WH3905> you.'

"But you today <WH3117> rejected <WH3988> your God, <WH430> who <WH834> delivers <WH3467> you from all <WH3605> your calamities <WH9567> and your distresses; <WH6869> yet you have said, <WH559> 'No, <WH3808> but set <WH7760> a king <WH4428> over <WH5921> us!' Now <WH6258> therefore, present <WH3320> yourselves before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> by your tribes <WH7626> and by your clans. <WH505>"
Thus Samuel <WH8050> brought <WH7126> all <WH3605> the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478> near, <WH7126> and the tribe <WH7626> of Benjamin <WH1144> was taken <WH3920> by lot.

Then he brought <WH7126> the tribe <WH7626> of Benjamin <WH1144> near <WH7126> by its families, <WH4940> and the Matrite <WH4309> family <WH4940> was taken. <WH3920> And Saul <WH7586> the son <WH1121> of Kish <WH7027> was taken; <WH3920> but when they looked <WH1245> for him, he could not be found. <WH4672>

Therefore they inquired <WH7592> further <WH5750> of the Lord, <WH3068> "Has the man <WH376> come <WH935> here <WH1988> yet <WH5750>?" So the Lord <WH3068> said, <WH559> "Behold, <WH2009> he is hiding <WH2244> himself <WH1931> by the baggage. <WH3627>"

So they ran <WH7323> and took <WH3947> him from there, <WH8033> and when he stood <WH3320> among <WH8432> the people, <WH5971> he was taller <WH1361> than <WH4480> any <WH3605> of the people <WH5971> from his shoulders <WH7926> upward. <WH4605>

And Samuel <WH8050> said <WH559> to all <WH3605> the people, <WH5971> "Do you see <WH7200> him whom <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> has chosen <WH977>? Surely <WH3588> there <WH369> is no <WH369> one <WH369> like <WH3644> him among all <WH3605> the people. <WH5971>" So all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shouted <WH7321> and said, <WH559> "[Long] live <WH2421> the king! <WH4428>"

Then Samuel <WH8050> told <WH1696> the people <WH5971> the ordinances <WH4941> of the kingdom, <WH4410> and wrote <WH3789> [them] in the book <WH5612> and placed <WH5117> [it] before <WH6440> the Lord. <WH3068> And Samuel <WH8050> sent <WH7971> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> away, <WH7971> each <WH376> one <WH376> to his house. <WH1004>

And Saul <WH7586> also <WH1571> went <WH1980> to his house <WH1004> at Gibeah; <WH1390> and the valiant <WH2428> [men] whose <WH834> hearts <WH3820> God <WH430> had touched <WH5060> went <WH1980> with him.

But certain worthless <WH1100> men <WH1121> said, <WH559> "How <WH4100> can this <WH2088> one <WH2088> deliver <WH3467> us?" And they despised <WH959> him and did not bring <WH935> him any present. <WH4503> But he kept <WH2790> silent. <WH2790>
